name: Verify that the add post page displays all elements correctly on desktop device

nodes.name: Type "admin" to email on Login page
Type "123456789" to password on Login page
Check layout: specs/post/postPage.gspec included tags: desktop

specs.name: inside screen 50px top, 2px left
errors: "toolbar" is 40px top instead of 50px and 168px left instead of 2px

sections.name: toolbar.insert_button, toolbar.undo_button, toolbar.redo_button, toolbar.table_content_button, toolbar.block_navigation_button are aligned horizontally next to each other with 0px margin

specs.name: inside header__settings.setting_button 8px top left right bottom

sections.name: header__settings.preview_button, header__settings.publish_button are aligned horizontally next to each other with 7px margin
editor_body.title_textfield, editor_body.content_textfield are aligned vertically above each other with 4px margin
panel_tab, components_panel_item-1 are aligned vertically above each other with 0px margin
panel_tab.tab_item-* are aligned horizontally next to each other with -1px margin
components_panel_item-2, components_panel_item-3, components_panel_item-4, components_panel_item-5, components_panel_item-6 are aligned vertically above each other with 1px margin
